name: The Sensitive Project
description:
Born during the 2020 pandemic, “The Sensitive Project” is a participative audiovisual experience that shapes emotions, helping people visualize, and even touch their own feelings. Through online conversations, participants from all over the world are invited to describe how they feel. Their answers are then rendered by designers, giving these feelings a form. Constantly growing and evolving, the project exposes a global emotionality through the interpretation and translation of the invisible into digital corporeality. Oral description: Orsolya Gal (Romania), 3D model: Ian Hill (USA)
Project by Catalina Tuca.
